mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PICKJOIN_TB( U_ID , PARTY_ID , PARTY_HOST , PICK_FLAG , JOIN_FLAG ) VALUES( #{u_id} , #{party_id} , 1 , 0 , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT PARTY_ID FROM( SELECT PARTY_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PARTY_ID DESC) AS RNUM FROM PARTY_TB ORDER BY PARTY_ID DESC ) WHERE RNUM = 1
SELECT P.PARTY_TITLE, PJ.U_ID, P.P_DATE, P.PARTY_ID FROM PARTY_TB P, PICKJOIN_TB PJ WHERE P.PARTY_ID = PJ.PARTY_ID AND PJ.PARTY_HOST = 1 ORDER BY P.PARTY_ID DESC
SELECT PARTY_TITLE , P_DATE , P_LOCATION , P_LONG , P_LATI , P_NUM , P_GENDER , P_COST , P_NOTE , HASHTAG FROM PARTY_TB WHERE PARTY_ID = #{party_id}

SELECT PARTY_TITLE, U_ID, P_DATE, PARTY_ID FROM ( SELECT P.PARTY_TITLE AS PARTY_TITLE , PJ.U_ID AS U_ID , P.P_DATE AS P_DATE , P.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY P.PARTY_ID DESC) AS RNUM FROM PARTY_TB P, PICKJOIN_TB PJ WHERE 1=1
AND P.PARTY_ID = PJ.PARTY_ID AND PJ.PARTY_HOST = 1 ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY PARTY_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(P.PARTY_ID) FROM PARTY_TB P, PICKJOIN_TB PJ WHERE 1=1
AND P.PARTY_ID > 0 AND P.PARTY_ID = PJ.PARTY_ID AND PJ.PARTY_HOST = 1
